Description:
Detects AzureHound (A BloodHound data collector for Microsoft Azure) activity via the default User-Agent that is used during its operation after successful authentication.

Author: Janantha Marasinghe
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Discovery Using AzureHound
Query: sourcetype='azure-signinlogs' eql select * from _source_ where useragent like '%azurehound%' and resulttype = '0'
